title: Breech Presentation
Definition: Frank (hips flexed, legs extended), Classic (legs flexed), Footling
Aetiology: Babies begin in breech then gradually rotate during gestation
RiskFactors: Poly/Oligohydraminos, Uterine deformities, Fetal deformities, Previous breech baby
Management: ECV at 36wks if nullip (37 if multip) 50% effective. Failure necessitates caesarean delivery
